title: nidam nidam
sahitya:
nidam nidam kandan padam adaip-paNIvEn shatamadu tAnenna sharaNam aDaivEn


anupallavi

  vida vidamAip-pala vindai purindiDum vIra vaDivElan pEraruL kOri nAn


caraNam    en idaya nEsan cennimalai vAsan punnakai tannilE minnoLi vIsumE
panniru kaNNilum taNNoLi minnumE sannidhi sErumen sankaTam tIrumE
